TABLE.NAME: townsquare_usersettings
TABLE.COMMENT: User Settings of the content filters in townsquare

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: User that set personal filter settings

FIELD.NAME: timefilter
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the time filter. Always a number from 0 to 4.

FIELD.NAME: letterfilter
FIELD.COMMENT: Setting of the letter filter. Always a number from 0 to 7
